dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and evaluating models on sequential digit recognition tasks, specifically designed to assess the performance of gated recurrent units (GRUs) and long short-term memory networks (LSTMs).
dcterms:title: Sequential MNIST

dcterms:creator: Giancarlo Kerg
Kyle Goyette
Maximilian Puelma Touzel
Gauthier Gidel
Eugene Vorontsov
Yoshua Bengio
Guillaume Lajoie
dcterms:description: A dataset referenced in the context of GRUs and LSTMs, focusing on learning long time dependencies while improving expressivity with transient dynamics.
